mapper.select: SELECT r.ROUTINE_NUMBER, a.MEMBER_NUMBER, a.ROUTINE_MEMBER_APPLY_DATE, l.ROUTINE_LEADER_NUMBER, l.ROUTINE_LEADER_NAME, r.ROUTINE_TITLE FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_routine_member_applicant WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}) a JOIN TBL_ROUTINE r ON a.ROUTINE_NUMBER = r.ROUTINE_NUMBER LEFT JOIN tbl_routine_leader l ON l.ROUTINE_LEADER_NUMBER = r.ROUTINE_LEADER_NUMBER
